about_the_game:
When you’re done living in the Classic City there are more worlds to explore in The Game of Life 2. Journey into the El Dorado world today and discover NEW outfits, vehicles, jobs, properties, avatars, and more!

Go on a brand new adventure! Be prepared for anything in the Archaeologist Outfit, or keep your eyes on the skies as the Pilot! Go to the Explorer’s Academy and become a Map Maker or Star Gazer, or set off straight away as a Bug Hunter or Path Finder.

When you’re ready, make your way into the Deep Jungle and discover an overgrown world of trees and ancient ruins. Find yourself in a beautiful Waterfall Village and venture onwards to the sparkling Golden City. Will you take the risky path over the crumbling bridge, or stay safe and drive through the Cave of Ancestors? Reach the Golden Temple and decide: stay in this magical land forever or jump in a biplane and fly on to your next life adventure!

In the El Dorado World, there are riches to be found in every decision you make. Your adventure starts here!
detailed_description:
When you’re done living in the Classic City there are more worlds to explore in The Game of Life 2. Journey into the El Dorado world today and discover NEW outfits, vehicles, jobs, properties, avatars, and more!

Go on a brand new adventure! Be prepared for anything in the Archaeologist Outfit, or keep your eyes on the skies as the Pilot! Go to the Explorer’s Academy and become a Map Maker or Star Gazer, or set off straight away as a Bug Hunter or Path Finder.

When you’re ready, make your way into the Deep Jungle and discover an overgrown world of trees and ancient ruins. Find yourself in a beautiful Waterfall Village and venture onwards to the sparkling Golden City. Will you take the risky path over the crumbling bridge, or stay safe and drive through the Cave of Ancestors? Reach the Golden Temple and decide: stay in this magical land forever or jump in a biplane and fly on to your next life adventure!

In the El Dorado World, there are riches to be found in every decision you make. Your adventure starts here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz single core processor
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU [1280 x 720]
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

short_description: Set off on a jungle adventure and grow through every decision. Hop in your Car, Paddle Boat or Copter. Take control as a Map Maker or see what life brings as a Path Finder. Find the Golden City and discover that the legend of El Dorado lives on!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
